explanation: Guitar, Piano, Drums, and Violin are all types of musical instruments that produce sound. A Microphone is a device used to capture and amplify sound, but it is not an instrument itself.

The Battle of Trafalgar, Battle of Midway, Battle of Lepanto, and Battle of Tsushima were all historically significant naval battles. The Battle of Waterloo, while also a decisive engagement, was a land battle.

Dozen (12), Pair (2), Score (20), and Gross (144) are all specific, named traditional units for counting a certain quantity of items. 'Hundred' is a standard decimal number and not a specialized traditional counting unit in the same way.
